cooked: Oh, by the way, the BMM transactions should all be linked in a chain, every new one always spending the “canonical” 1234sat output from the previous – when you see that chain broken that is probably because I was testing myself, then abandoning the chain and starting a new one, before releasing it to the public.
topic_title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
topic_html_title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
raw: Oh, by the way, the BMM transactions should all be linked in a chain, every new one always spending the "canonical" `1234sat` output from the previous -- when you see that chain broken that is probably because I was testing myself, then abandoning the chain and starting a new one, before releasing it to the public.
